Summary: hard to see shape over whelming lights.. loud roar of sound.
divs: Sighting Detailswe were hiking by a lake and came over a crest and in the valley was a bright light and horrific noise. we saw the light begin to lift and we turnned to run and heard the roar of the ufo. we turnned to see that it was gone. we contacted local police but told us there was nothing they could do. we were scared and it took our breath away.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Ashland
There were no other sightings in Ashland on or around May 28th 2007
